sameAnalysis.word_list: car, bus, truck, lorry, coach, automobile, jeep, carriage, waggon
means: car ： 多指乘坐人的小汽车或轿车。
bus ： 一般指公共汽车或大型客车。
truck与lorry同义，都指卡车或货车，前者为美国用词，后者用于英国。
coach ： 原义指四轮马车，现指轿式汽车，长途公共汽车，还可指火车设有卧铺的车厢。
jeep ： 吉普车，指一种小型轻便、适合在崎岖路面或野外使用的车子。
carriage ： 指马车，两匹或两匹以上马拉的四轮马。
waggon ： 指四轮运货马车或牛车，也指铁路的无盖货车。

sentence.Network_en: He sat in the corner of a second-class carriage.
sentence.Network_cn: 他坐在一节二等车厢的角落里。

sentence.Network_en: Her legs were long and fine, her hips slender, her carriage erect.
A carriage door struck him as a train drew into Basildon station.
sentence.Network_cn: 当火车驶进巴斯尔登站时，一节车厢的门撞到他了。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old Northern French cariage, from carier (see carry)

entry.def: A carriage is an old-fashioned vehicle, usually for a small number of passengers, which is pulled by horses.

example.ex: The President-elect followed in an open carriage drawn by six beautiful gray horses.
example.tran: 新当选的总统紧随其后，乘坐一辆由6匹漂亮的灰马拉着的敞篷马车。

entry.def: A carriage is one of the separate, long sections of a train that carries passengers.
A carriage is the same as a baby carriage .
Carriage is the cost or action of transporting or delivering goods.

example.ex: It costs £10.86 for one litre including carriage...
example.tran: 连运费在内,每升花费10.86英镑。

example.ex: If the Government introduces a carbon tax on road haulage, then carriage by water will become more attractive.
example.tran: 如果政府开始对公路运输征收碳税,那么水运就会变得更加具有吸引力。

entry.def: Your carriage is the way you hold your body and head when you are walking, standing, or sitting.

example.ex: Her legs were long and fine, her hips slender, her carriage erect.

means.word_mean: 2. a vehicle with four wheels drawn by two or more horses
3. characteristic way of bearing one's body;
4. a machine part that carries something else
5. a small vehicle with four wheels in which a baby or child is pushed around

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 名词或动词后缀,表示"状态,总称"; 2. [做的]状态,过程; 3. 名词后缀,表示"费用"; 4. 名词后缀,表示"场所,物品"

stems_affixes.word_buile: dam+age状态,总称→n.损害,伤害
carry携带,运送+age费用→carriage运费
post邮件+age费用→n.邮资
rail铁路+age费用→n.铁路运输,铁路运费
tow拖+age费用→n.拖[船,车]费
water水+age费用→n.水路运输,水运费
anchor铁锚+age场所,物品→n.停泊地点;抛锚地点
append附加+age表示名词→n.附加物
bever饮,喝+age场所,物品→n.[水,酒等之外的]饮料
cot小床,小屋+age场所→cottage村舍,小屋
herit继承+age场所,物品→n.遗产,继承物;传统
hermit隐居士+age场所,物品→n.隐居处
lug拖拉+age物品→需要拖运的物品→luggage行李,皮箱
vill茅屋+age场所,物品→n.村,村庄
wreck残骸+age场所,物品→n.残骸,碎片

stems_affixes.value_cn: 优点,长处,有利条件;利益,好处
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad+vant=van前卫,先锋+age状态,总称→n.优点,长处,有利条件;利益,好处
dot打点,打盹+age状态,总称→n.老年糊涂,溺爱
drain排干+age状态,总称→n.排水;下水道
foli叶+age状态,总称→n.叶子[总称]
marry结婚+age状态,总称→marriage
mile英里+age状态,总称→n.里程
patron赞助人+age状态,总称→n.赞助,惠顾
percent百分比+age状态,总称→n.百分率
pilgrim朝圣+age状态,总称→n.朝圣
short短+age状态,总称→n.不足,缺乏
ton吨+age状态,总称→tonnage吨位
verbi=verb词语+age状态,总称→词的状态→冗长
vis看+age状态,总称→n.脸,面貌
pill抢夺+age状态,总称→n.&v.抢劫,掠夺
en进入+vis看+age[做的]状态→进入看的状态

stems_affixes.value_cn: 汽车, 小汽车, 车辆, 客车, [铁]车厢
stems_affixes.word_buile: car装载,负担→n.汽车, 小汽车, 车辆, 客车, [铁]车厢
car车+eer人→愿意为车辆经过的道路→人所经历的路程→事业, 生涯

stems_affixes.value_cn: 船货, [车、船、飞机等运输的]货物
stems_affixes.word_buile: car装载,负担+go→n.船货, [车、船、飞机等运输的]货物
car装载,负担+pent+er人→n.木匠

stems_affixes.value_cn: 马车, 客车, 运费
stems_affixes.word_buile: carry携带, 运送+age物品→马车, 客车

stems_affixes.value_cn: 运送者, 邮递员, 带菌者
stems_affixes.word_buile: carry携带, 运送+er人→carrier运送者, 带菌者
car装载,负担+t→n.大车, 手推车

stems_affixes.value_cn: 携带, 运送, 支持, 支撑, 传送, 意味
stems_affixes.word_buile: car装载,负担+ry→携带, 运送

jushi.english: The first class carriages are in front.
She rode in a carriage pulled by four white horses.
jushi.chinese: 她乘坐一辆四匹白马拉的四轮马车。

jushi.english: The carriage on these precision instruments is high.
jushi.chinese: 这些精密仪器的运费很贵。
